arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest head coach Nuno Espirito Santo defends owner Evangelos Marinakis after on-pitch clash amid Leicester City draw
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest head coach Nuno Espirito Santo attempts to play down owner Evangelos Marinakis deciding to confront him on the pitch after Sunday's 2-2 draw with Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest 2-2 Leicester: Highlights, man of the match, stats as the Reds see their Champions League hopes take a hit
arts.sum: Nottingham Forest's hopes of securing Champions League football for next season take another hit, with the Reds held to a 2-2 draw by already-relegated Leicester City.

arts.ttl: Evangelos Marinakis confronts Nuno Espirito Santo on pitch after Forest draw
arts.sum: The Reds owner remonstrated with his manager as their Champions League qualification hopes were dealt another blow.

arts.ttl: Nottingham Forest v Leicester, Manchester United v West Ham and more: Premier League – live
arts.sum: Updates from Sunday’s afternoon kick-offs Email Sarah | Live scores | Sign up to Football Daily Leicester’s Jamie Vardy will hit a milestone for the club today if he scores.
